pkg:pull:
sh -c 'git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "You project has modifications, please commit and push or stash them first.
" && exit 1)' -
sh -c 'echo "\nStep 2: Pull latest changes or clone if not exists...\n"' - or restore removed package

sh -c 'git subtree merge --prefix="pkg/$1" git@github.com:$1.git main || (git checkout $(git --no-pager log -1 --format="%H" -- pkg/$1/)^ -- pkg/$1 && git commit -am "Restore package $1" && git subtree merge --prefix="pkg/$1" git@github.com:$1.git main) || git subtree pull --prefix="pkg/$1" git@github.com:$1.git main;' -
sh -c 'echo "\nStep 3: Updating composer.json and add the package to the autoloader...\n"' -
sh -c 'echo "It‚Äôs fully integrated into your repository as if you wrote it yourself."' -
sh -c 'echo "You can make changes directly in your repository, and the commits will be saved to your own history."' -
sh -c 'echo "It‚Äôs perfectly fine to maintain a customized version of the package within your main project."' -
sh -c 'echo "If you have sufficient permissions, you can push your changes to the central package repository using: composer pkg:push $1."' -

scripts-descriptions.pkg:use: Install a package from a pkg repository. For example: `composer pkg:use confetti-cms/bool`
